Package org.jeasy.states.core

Class FiniteStateMachineBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.jeasy.states.core.FiniteStateMachineBuilder
public class FiniteStateMachineBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
FSM builder : this class is the main entry point to build FSM instances. Only states set and initial state are mandatory.
Author:
Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud.benhassine@icloud.com)

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FiniteStateMachineBuilder​(java.util.Set<State> states, State initialState)
    Create a new FiniteStateMachineBuilder.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    FiniteStateMachine build()
    Build a FSM instance.

    Register FSM final state which is not mandatory.

    Register FSM final states set.
    FiniteStateMachineBuilder registerTransition​(Transition transition)

  • Constructor Details

    • FiniteStateMachineBuilder

      public FiniteStateMachineBuilder​(java.util.Set<State> states, State initialState)
      Create a new FiniteStateMachineBuilder.
      Parameters:
      states - set of the machine
      initialState - of the machine

  • Method Details

    • registerTransition

      public FiniteStateMachineBuilder registerTransition​(Transition transition)
      Register a transition within FSM transitions set. If the transition is not valid, this method may throw an IllegalArgumentException.
      Parameters:
      transition - the transition to register
      Returns:
      a configured FSM Builder instance

    • registerTransitions

      public FiniteStateMachineBuilder registerTransitions​(java.util.Set<Transition> transitions)
      Register a set of transitions within FSM transitions set. If a transition is not valid, this method throws an IllegalArgumentException.
      Parameters:
      transitions - the transitions set to register
      Returns:
      a configured FSM Builder instance

    • registerFinalState

      public FiniteStateMachineBuilder registerFinalState​(State finalState)
      Register FSM final state which is not mandatory. Once in final state, the FSM will ignore all incoming events.
      Parameters:
      finalState - the FSM final state
      Returns:
      a configured FSM Builder instance

    • registerFinalStates

      public FiniteStateMachineBuilder registerFinalStates​(java.util.Set<State> finalStates)
      Register FSM final states set. Once in final state, the FSM will ignore all incoming events.
      Parameters:
      finalStates - the FSM final states to register
      Returns:
      a configured FSM Builder instance

    • build

      public FiniteStateMachine build()
      Build a FSM instance. This method checks if FSM definition is valid. If FSM state is not valid, this methods throws an IllegalStateException
      Returns:
      a configured FSM instance
